pages.title: Storage Stabilizers
pages.text: $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_stabilizer_tier1)Storage Stabilizers$(/l) increase the storage space in the storage dimension. There are four tiers ($(l:rituals/crafting/craft_stabilizer_tier1)Tier 1$(/l), $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_stabilizer_tier2)Tier 2$(/l), $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_stabilizer_tier3)Tier 3$(/l), $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_stabilizer_tier4)Tier 4$(/l)), each adding more slots than the last. Storage controllers need to point at the $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_dimensional_matrix)Dimensional Matrix$(/l) (one block above the Storage Actuator) and cannot be more than 5 blocks away.
The red lines illustrate the line of sight, they will not show up in game!
